title: Halo Devaura RS2 Rim Brake Road Wheels
content:
In an era when rim brake wheels and silver components are seemingly at an all-time low, we have to buy those products when we find them. The Devaura RS2 (£205.00 – £295.00) is Halo’s 700c tubeless-ready road clincher wheelset.

The rim width of the 19mm internal and 24mm external allows you to run your choice of traditional or tubeless tires and is well suited to modern tires ranging from 25 mm to 35 mm widths to enhance comfort and grip.

Halo is distributed in the USA by BTI, right here in Santa Fe.

Specs:

  • Rims: Halo Devaura Rim 700c
  • Hubs: Halo RS2 Front and RS2 Supadrive Hubs
  • Front wheel weight 720 g
  • Rear wheel weight: 940 g
  • Spokes: Halo Silver double-butted stainless spokes
  • Nipples: Halo Silver Alloy Race Nipples
  • Rim Depth: 31mm
  • Internal Rim Width: 19mm
  • External Rim Width: 24mm
  • Rim Joint Type: Sleeved
  • Front Hub Spacing: 100mm
  • Rear Hub Spacing: 130mm
  • Drillings: Front-20 radial laced, Rear- 24 (16/8E – 2:1 for lateral stiffness)
  • Freehub Type: Shimano HG, Campag or XD-R
  • Drive System: Halo Supadrive
  • Spoke pattern: Radial front, 2 cross-drive rear, 1 Cross non-drive rear
  • Recommended Tyre Size: 23-38C
  • Tubeless: Tubeless ready
  • Color: Silver with CNC brake surface.

See more at Halo.
